滮字的基本解释

滮
biāo
〔滮池〕又名冰池、圣女泉。古河名，在今中国陕西省西安市西北：“滮池北流。”
〔滮滮〕（水）流动的样子。

滮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biāo］
［《廣韻》皮彪切，平幽，並。］
(1)水流貌。
(2)谓蓄水。

滮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页643第28
【廣韻】皮彪切【集韻】皮虬切【韻會】【正韻】皮休切，?音淲。【說文】水流貌。【詩·小雅】滮池北流。　又水名。【水經注】郭水西北註，與滮池合。　又【集韻】平幽切，音瀌。義同。　【說文】本作彪。

滮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滮字的起名意思

水流的样子。

flowing of water
Basic explanation of words
flowing of water
biāo
〔滮池〕 Also known as Bingchi, Saint Woman Spring. The name of the ancient river, in the northwest of Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, China: "Panchi River North."
〔滮滮〕(Water) The way it flows.
flowing of water
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biāo］
["Guangyun" Pi Biaoqie, quiet, and. ]
(1) Water flow appearance.
(2) It is called water storage.
flowing of water
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　滮; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 643 28
[Guang Yun] Pi Biao cut [Ji Yun] Pi Qiu cut [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Pi Xiu cut,? Yin Nao. [Said the text] Water flow appearance. [Poetry·Xiaoya] North Stream of Panchi.　Also known as water. [Shui Jing Zhu] Guo Shui Northwest Note, combined with Tanchi.　[Jiyun] Ping and quiet, sound and sound. The same meaning.　【Said the text】This is a Biao.
